programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Bréidín & Clúmh
programme.desc: Réitíonn Bréidín bricfeasta do Chlúmh ach iontas na n-iontas tá Clúmh lán go béal! (Tweedy learns that there is such a thing as too many treats for the usually hungry Fluff!)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Ná habair! Tháinig tromluí ar Cody! (Oh no, Cody had a bad dream!)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Haigh Didil, Didil an cat is an fhidil! (Hey Diddle, Diddle, it's the cat and the fiddle?!)

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Tá Dora ag iarraidh solas oíche a thabhairt chomh fada leis an leabharlann sula mbeidh sé ródhorcha. (Dora needs to bring night light to the library before dark.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Teastaíonn inneall nua do Dylan an Dumpaire. /Caithfidh Gecko agus na Meicneoirí cuidiú le Santaí. (Dylan the Dumper needs a new engine. / Gecko and the Mechanics must help Santy.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Casann Posy amhrán do Pip ar an ucailéile agus baineann sé féin triail as. (When Posy shows Pip her tune on the ukulele, he has a go and finds it easy.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Ní bhíonn duine ná deoraí fanta sa lucht féachana ó tharla go nglacann siad ar fad páirt i Seó na nDuillí. (Everyone joins in at the Leaf Show.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Dúisíonn an Ninja Oíche dragan. An gcuirfidh seisean na laochra de dhroim seoil? (Night Ninja steals an ancient gong to awaken a real Dragon!)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Tagann Wussywat ar uirlisí ceoil ach níl sí in ann iad a sheinm. (Wussywat finds some musical instruments but can't play them properly.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tá maisiúcháin an chrainn Nollag ar iarraidh. (The Christmas tree decorations are missing.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata, Ag Campáil
programme.desc: Rachaidh an Cat, Nic agus Sailí ar eachtra sa samhraidh. (The Cat takes Nick and Sally on a summer adventure!)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Tá na Guanos tinn tuirseach dá namhaid agus socraíonn siad an ruaig a chur ar Pat. (The Guanos are losing patience with their sworn enemy, and try to get rid of Pat.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Curious George: An Scannán
programme.desc: Is fear uasal é Fear an Hata Bhuí a thugann aire dá pheata beag. (The Man in the Yellow Hat is a gentleman who looks after his pet monkey.)

programme.title: Smidín
programme.desc: Scéal faoi iasc beag le samhlaíocht den scoth. Bíonn scéal nua ag Tiddler dá chairde chuile lá. (Tiddler, the tale of a little fish with a big imagination.)

programme.title: Momonsters
programme.desc: Ní mór do na Momonsters dul a chodladh sula dtagann Daidí na Nollag. (The Momonsters have to go to sleep before Santa Claus arrives.)

programme.title: Zou
programme.desc: Rachaidh Zou, Elzee agus Daideo sa tóir ar eachtráin inniu. (Zou, Elzee and Grandpa go in search of aliens today.)

programme.title: ANÚNA: A Whisper of Paradise
programme.desc: Rogha ceoil le téama an gheimhridh, cuid de na carúil Nollag is cáiliúla ar domhan san áireamh. (A selection of winter-themed music, including some of the best-known carols.)

programme.title: Scannán: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Filleann sionnach mealltach ar a sheanbhealaí i mbun creachadóireachta ar fheirmeacha. (An urbane fox returns to his farm raiding ways.)

programme.title: Ceol ón gCré
programme.desc: Tugann Nell cuairt ar chuid de na pobail iascaireachta is saibhre ó thaobh an cheoil de in Éirinn. (Nell visits some of Ireland's most musically rich fishing communities.)

programme.title: Scannán: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Téann Kermit agus a chairde go Nua-Eabhrac lena gceoldráma a chur ar stáitse in Broadway. (Kermit and his friends head to New York City in an attempt to make it on Broadway.)

programme.title: Scoth na gComórtas Ardáin 2025
programme.desc: Súil siar ar na comórtais ardáin agus na comórtais béil ó Oireachtas na Samhna 2025. (A look back at the highlights from some of the competitions at Oireachtas na Samhna 2025.)

programme.title: Scannán: Kung Fu Panda

programme.title: Geantraí na Nollag 2025

programme.title: Ros na Rún
programme.desc: Cuireann Natasha iachall ar Cora deireadh a chur leis an ngealltanas pósta. (Natasha puts pressure on Cora to call off her engagement.)
